designScenario.description: Design a next-generation Communication System tailored for airplane avionics, ensuring reliable, secure, and high-performance communication.
designScenario.name: Advanced Communication System

details.description: Enable diverse communication, including voice, video, telemetry, and data streaming.
Ensure operational reliability with secure encryption and interference mitigation.
Real-time communication capabilities with sub-40 millisecond latency.
Throughputs exceeding 200 Mbps to handle high-density data.
Provide self-diagnosis and automatic system recovery options.
Intuitively designed interfaces for streamlined operator usage.

relationships.description: The Control Unit manages and synchronizes communication workflows.
Interconnect between antennas and signal modules for data transmission.
Signal Processor integrates functions for transmission and encryption preparation.

subComponents.description: Manages signal intensification for improved clarity.
subComponents.name: Signal Amplification Unit

systemComponents.description: Submodule equipped to ensure encrypted secure transmissions.
systemComponents.name: Encryption Unit

comments.body: VHF Communication System is used for short-range voice communication between aircraft and air traffic control.
This constraint represents the system's maximum communication latency.

rag_context: The VHF Communication System operates on the VHF frequency band of 118-137 MHz, with a transmission power of 25W. It has a receiver sensitivity within 1dB accuracy and a communication latency below 50ms. The system design includes dual redundant circuitry for reliability and compliance with critical aviation standards such as DO-178/DO-254. The system is designed for short-range voice communication between aircraft and air traffic control, ensuring real-time communication, safety-critical redundancy, and seamless integration with the aircraft's communication network to support flight operations and ensure operational safety.
